timeline.bodyText: I think this name should be changed, ajaxJson is already used as a class field.
timeline.author: Stypox

replies.bodyText:
You're right, this is why we need Checkstyle here as well…
No, you're not right, we have initialData as class field, not ajaxJson.
You're right, Android Studio was acting weird.
replies.author: wb9688

timeline.author: Stypox

timeline.message: Extract trailer thumbnail in YT learning playlists
